parameters.name: InstanceChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Set the value to PostPaid. Only pay-as-you-go instances can be created by using elasticity assurances.

Default value: PostPaid.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries per page.

Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the request to retrieve a new page of results. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: PrivatePoolOptions.Ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the elasticity assurances. The value can be a JSON array that consists of up to 100 elasticity assurance IDs. Separate the IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the elasticity assurances. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group. If you configure this parameter to query resources, up to 1,000 resources that belong to the specified resource group can be displayed in the response.

> Resources in the default resource group are displayed in the response regardless of whether you configure this parameter.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the elasticity assurances. Valid values:

*   All
*   Preparing
*   Prepared
*   Active
*   Released

Default value: Active.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the elasticity assurances.
